blocks.name: 2 truths & a lie
blocks.desc: Tell 2 truths and a lie, You drink whenever someone guesses what the lie is

blocks.name: 4 Eyes
blocks.desc: Anyone with glasses drinks

blocks.name: Accent
blocks.desc: Speak with an accent for the rest of the game

blocks.name: Archenemy
blocks.desc: Give someone 4 drinks

blocks.name: arm wrestle
blocks.desc: Arm wrestle with the person to your left. The loser drinks

blocks.name: Baby Talk
blocks.desc: You can only speak in one syllable words

blocks.name: Backseat driver
blocks.desc: Person to your left picks the piece you pull next turn

blocks.name: bar tender
blocks.desc: You are now the bartender and have to fetch or mix everyones drinks

blocks.name: Batman
blocks.desc: You have to talk like Batman

blocks.name: battle of the sexes
blocks.desc: Opposite sex of you drinks

blocks.name: bipolar
blocks.desc: compliment person to your right, insult person to your left

blocks.name: Blind man
blocks.desc: For the rest of the game you have to pull the block out with your eyes shut

blocks.name: body guard
blocks.desc: Pick someone to be your bodyguard, they must taste your drink before you drink it for the rest of the game

blocks.name: Boobs
blocks.desc: All girls drink

blocks.name: BRO
blocks.desc: If you make eye contact with someone you have ot say bro

blocks.name: Buckle Up
blocks.desc: you are now buckled in, you must undo and redo your seat belt when you get up

blocks.name: Can of Whoop-Ass
blocks.desc: At any one time during the game someone gives you 2 or more drinks, you may give them 10 drinks in return.  If you are a Bodyguard, you may also do so if the drinks are given to the person you're guarding.

blocks.name: Cannonball
blocks.desc: Pick a Code Word.  If you hear this code word, you must destroy the tower and the person responsible drinks

blocks.name: Cartwheel
blocks.desc: Pull a semi decent cartwheel and everyone else drinks - otherwise you drink

blocks.name: Categories
blocks.desc: Pick a category, everyone must say something in that category. First person to Fails drinks

blocks.name: Censored
blocks.desc: When you Swear, You Drink

blocks.name: Cheers
blocks.desc: Give 2, take 2

blocks.name: Clothes Swap
blocks.desc: Choose two players, they must swap a selected piece of clothing eith eacother

blocks.name: cocktail of doom
blocks.desc: Everyone makes a shot for you to take.

blocks.name: codenames
blocks.desc: Other players give you a nickname that you are now refered by

blocks.name: compliments
blocks.desc: give a compliment to everyone in the room

blocks.name: copycat
blocks.desc: The last block now applies to you

blocks.name: cray cray cat lady
blocks.desc: drink for every cat you have ever owned

blocks.name: crypt keeper
blocks.desc: oldest person drinks

blocks.name: Deja Vu:
blocks.desc: Previous person goes again!

blocks.name: Depersonalization
blocks.desc: You can no longer call anyone by their names, and you cannot point at them.

blocks.name: Dicks
blocks.desc: All guys drink

blocks.name: Dicktator
blocks.desc: As long as this block i s blanaced on your head you are impervious from any other blocks

blocks.name: Diddle Finger
blocks.desc: you can only use one finger to remove blocks

blocks.name: ditto
blocks.desc: Pick someone to ditto for the rest of the game - When they Drink you Drink, When you Drink They Drink

blocks.name: Do Over
blocks.desc: Put this piece back in the tower and pull a different one.

blocks.name: Double Hands
blocks.desc: Use both hands when your handling your drink or pulling blocks

blocks.name: down the hatch
blocks.desc: Finish your drink

blocks.name: drink pulling
blocks.desc: On your next turn take a block while drinking

blocks.name: Drink swap
blocks.desc: Swap your drink with someone elses

blocks.name: embryo
blocks.desc: The youngest person dirnks

blocks.name: Eye Contact
blocks.desc: Pull another block from the tower while maintaining eye contact with the person across from you

blocks.name: Fortune Teller
blocks.desc: Predict who will cause the tower to fall. If your right pick someone to be a loser with them. Otherwise you drink with the loser

blocks.name: Game of Chicken
blocks.desc: Give 1 drink. That player may give you back 1. You may then give them back another. Keep going until someone bails, they then have to drink the last given

blocks.name: Ghost
blocks.desc: Reenact the scene from ghost, and help the next player remove their piece while behind them arms around their body

blocks.name: give 1
blocks.desc: give 1

blocks.name: give 2
blocks.desc: give 2

blocks.name: Give 3
blocks.desc: give 3

blocks.name: God save the queen
blocks.desc: If someone puts a coin in your drink you must drown it as the queen is drowning & its your civil duty to save her

blocks.name: Greedy Cunt
blocks.desc: Take another block

blocks.name: Guess underwear colour
blocks.desc: The player has to guess the other player's underwear colour, drinks for every wrong answer.

blocks.name: Gun Show
blocks.desc: Bare your biceps and flex for everyone. players next to you drink for the view

blocks.name: hand switch
blocks.desc: Use your non-dominant hand to pull blocks

blocks.name: heads up
blocks.desc: do not read aloud, throw this tile at someone. if they catch you drink otherwise they drink

blocks.name: i am groot
blocks.desc: tallest person drinks

blocks.name: I'm a doctor, not a bricklayer!
blocks.desc: Take a Drink and get someone else to put this block on the tower

blocks.name: Indecisive
blocks.desc: Take another block and put it back

blocks.name: Jar Jar
blocks.desc: You have to speak like JarJar Binks

blocks.name: Know it all
blocks.desc: You are now the question master, if someone answers a question you ask they must drink - Lasts until used

blocks.name: Lightning Round
blocks.desc: Lighting round, going around every player till its back to you everyone only has 10 second to remove a block

blocks.name: make a rule
blocks.desc: make a rule that stands for the rest of the game

blocks.name: Mamma Bird
blocks.desc: Take a drink, but the person to your right pours it into your mouth

blocks.name: mini-me
blocks.desc: The Shortest Person Drinks

blocks.name: Narcissist
blocks.desc: Everyone Compliments you when they have to drink

blocks.name: Neighbours
blocks.desc: The two people next to you must drink

blocks.name: never have i ever
blocks.desc: Make a statement about something youve never done, anyone who has done this drinks

blocks.name: No Depth Perception
blocks.desc: For the rest of the game you must drink with your eyes closed.

blocks.name: no guts no glory
blocks.desc: you cant take any center pieces

blocks.name: not it
blocks.desc: do not read aloud, the last player to touch there finger to their nose must drink 2

blocks.name: one must drink
blocks.desc: everyone votes, person with most votes drinks

blocks.name: pass
blocks.desc: Do not place on top of the tower. On a future turn you can place this piece instead of pulling a new piece

blocks.name: Pirate
blocks.desc: YAAARRR, talk like a pirate

blocks.name: Point of No Return
blocks.desc: You must take a tile from within 3 rows of the top for the rest of the game.

blocks.name: Psychiatrist
blocks.desc: Describe an embarrassing personal moment and choose someone to analyze it. Both of you drink 1

blocks.name: Pushup
blocks.desc: Everyone has to do 10 pushups or drink 2

blocks.name: Questions
blocks.desc: Everyone speaks in questions, when someone doesnt they drink and its over

blocks.name: Quiet Please
blocks.desc: Anyone who makes noise during your turn must drink, must "shh" at the beginning of your turn

blocks.name: rainbow connection
blocks.desc: pick a colour, everyone drinks if they are wearing that colour

blocks.name: Remove a Rule
blocks.desc: Remove an rule from the game

blocks.name: Reverse
blocks.desc: Order of play reverses

blocks.name: rewind
blocks.desc: take a block from the top and put it back into the tower

blocks.name: Rhyme
blocks.desc: Say a word, person to right has to say a word that rhymes with it. First person to not rhyme drinks

blocks.name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
blocks.desc: On a count of 3, everyone throws down. You drink for every person who beats you. Every person you beat drinks 1

blocks.name: Roger Roger
blocks.desc: You must finish every sentence with "Roger Roger"

blocks.name: Royale we
blocks.desc: refer to yourself as the royal "We"

blocks.name: santa
blocks.desc: sit on the person opposite lap until its your turn again

blocks.name: siblings
blocks.desc: Drink 1 for every sibling you have

blocks.name: Skip
blocks.desc: Skip the next player

blocks.name: slap
blocks.desc: everyone gets a free gentle slap on you during the game

blocks.name: snake eyes
blocks.desc: if anyone looks into your eyes for the rest of the game they drink

blocks.name: Soberesest
blocks.desc: The least drunk person in the group has to drink

blocks.name: sociable drinking
blocks.desc: everyone drinks

blocks.name: speech
blocks.desc: make a 60 second speech

blocks.name: spin the bottle
blocks.desc: spin the bottle, looser drinks

blocks.name: Staring Contest
blocks.desc: Challenge someone to stare down first one to blink drinks.

blocks.name: Swine Rulls
blocks.desc: To talk to a person you have to point at them - you also have to swear constantly

blocks.name: t-rex arms
blocks.desc: you must do everything with t-rex arms for the rest of the game, elbows touching your sides

blocks.name: take 1
blocks.desc: Take 1

blocks.name: take 2
blocks.desc: Take 3

blocks.name: take 2 and redo
blocks.desc: Take 2 drinks and pull another tile

blocks.name: take 3
blocks.desc: Take 3

blocks.name: the real slim shady
blocks.desc: Stand up for the rest of the game

blocks.name: Thief
blocks.desc: Take a drink of your neighbours drink

blocks.name: threeman
blocks.desc: whenever a row is completed take a drink - if you complete a row you make someone else the threeman

blocks.name: time out
blocks.desc: stand with your face in the corner of the room until your next turn. no talking or drinking

blocks.name: Touchy feely
blocks.desc: Everyone must remove the first piece they touch

blocks.name: truth or date
blocks.desc: Pick Truth or Dare

blocks.name: Wasted Education
blocks.desc: Drink 1 for every year you spent in Uni that is now meaningless in your chosen profession.

blocks.name: Waterfall
blocks.desc: You start drinking, person to your left starts and so on. When you stop person to your left stops and so on

blocks.name: Yes or No
blocks.desc: Everyone asks you a Yes or No question. If you dont want to answer you drink
